name: Commander Quest
storyline:
Chaos reigns in Middle-earth, and war is unending.
All factions have turned against each other, and this chaos has led to problems arising everywhere.

Bandits and deserters are increasing, and major strongholds have been taken over by large monsters.

Some factions seek commanders to lead them through the many battles ahead,
and someone, seeking to fulfill that wish, summons famous commanders from our world into theirs.

Thus, the player embarks on a peculiar adventure, leading a Dwarven legion as Richard I.
summary: 'Commander Quest' is a unique roguelike that combines the deck-building card game genre with real-time strategy gameplay. Experience a one-of-a-kind gameplay where cute but brutal fantasy units engage in battle. Think about the synergies between your cards and the interactions between units on the field, and enjoy a game that offers both originality and depth.
